nodes.text: Hello.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: How can I train my cooking?
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: No, thank you.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
Hello there! Are you interested in hearing all about
cooking?
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Alternatively, you could acquire some raw beef or
chicken. You can find cows and chickens north of here.
Go over the bridge then follow the path north, you can't
miss them!
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Alternatively, you can use your own fire, but it's not as
effective and the food will burn more frequently. To
make a fire, use a tinderbox on some logs.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Once you've found your range or fire, use your raw
food on it. This will bring up a menu of the food you
can cook. Then select the food you want.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Look for this symbol on your minimap after climbing the
stairs of the Lumbridge Castle to the top. There are
numerous banks around the world, all marked with that
symbol.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text:
When you have a full inventory of cooked food, drop
the useless burnt food and find a bank.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
If you're interested in quests, I heard my friend the
cook in Lumbridge Castle is in need of a hand. Just
talk to him and he'll set you off.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text: Is there anything else you want to know?
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Well, just come back any time you want to know how
to cook up a storm!
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
The simplest thing to cook is raw meat or fish. Shrimp
can be caught south of here, to the east of Lumbridge
Swamp. You could ask the fishing tutor for a net if you
have not got one.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Many things! You can cook anything from fish to
poultry. You could try your hand at making baked
potatoes or even brew some of the good stuff.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text: What would you like to hear about?
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

text.ENG: How can I train my cooking?
What kinds of things can I cook?
Tell me about Fish and Meat.
Tell me about Pies and Pizzas.

nodes.text: Tell me about Fish and Meat.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Tell me about Brewing.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Tell me about Vegetables.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: Tell me about Pies and Pizzas.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
When you have a full inventory of meat or fish, find a
range. Look for this icon on your minimap.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text:
You can brew your own beers using the fermenting
vats in either Keldagrim or Port Phasmatys.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text:
Fish and meat of most varieties can be cooked very
simply on either a fire or range, experiment which one
works for you.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text: You could use my range here if you like.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Most of the time, cooking meat and fish requires
nothing else but a range or fire. More complicated
dishes might require specialized equipment.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Would you like to hear about anything else I
mentioned?
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
You might find that when killing monsters, they drop
some raw meat for you to cook.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Some of them might have hidden properties. Such as
anglerfish, but you will find it hard getting hold of any
of them at this time.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
You might find it hard getting to these places but you
can always buy beer at any pub. Some pubs sell unique
beers too.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Use a pot of flour with a bucket of water. Yo uwill then
need to make some pastry dough.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text:
They require many different ingredients to make, such
as butter and vegetables, but you will find it hard to
acquire the ingredients needed.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Finally cook your pie by using the unbaked pie on a
cooking range. Mmmm...pie.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Use the patry dough with a pie dish to get a pie shell,
then add your choice of filling such as apples or red
berries.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text:
Now you will need to get yourself a tomato and some
cheese. Use the tomato on the pizza base and then use
the cheese. Cook the uncooked pizza base and there you
have yourself a plain pizza.
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text:
Next, we have pizza. You will first need to make
yourself a pizza base, use a pot of flour with a bucket
of water and make a pizza base.
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
If you want to, you could add yourself a topping to the
pizza too. Why not try some anchovies?
nodes.title: Cooking tutor

nodes.text:
Baked potatoes are a more advanced food and are
healthy too!
nodes.title: EMPTY

nodes.text: What kinds of things can I cook?
nodes.title: <player>
